Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/88th
ShortDescription: NB #9 Ashland buses are temp rerouted via Leaving the 95th Beverly terminal, Eastbound to Vincennes, 87th & Ashland, due to police activity near Ashland/88th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Leaving the 95th Beverly terminal, Eastbound to Vincennes, 87th and Ashland, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Ashland/88th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue  Line Service Delayed at Western-cn
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western-cn due to police activity. Crews working to restore service. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (Forest Park Branch) due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
